name: Semicolon

sections.text:
Syntax: ;<<text>>
A semicolon introduces characters that are to be ignored, such as
comments.  The semicolon and all characters up to and including the next
newline or end of file are ignored.

Semicolon
---------

Syntax: ;<<text>>

A semicolon introduces characters that are to be ignored, such as
comments.  The semicolon and all characters up to and including the next
newline or end of file are ignored.
